verses.verse: O give thanks <WH3034> unto the LORD, <WH3068> for <WH3588> he is good: <WH2896> for <WH3588> his mercy <WH2617> endureth forever. <WH5769>
Let the redeemed <WH1350> of the LORD <WH3068> say <WH559> so, whom <WH834> he hath redeemed <WH1350> from the hand <WH4480> <WH3027> of the enemy; <WH6862>

And gathered <WH6908> them out of the lands, <WH4480> <WH776> from the east, <WH4480> <WH4217> and from the west, <WH4480> <WH4628> from the north, <WH4480> <WH6828> and from the south. <WH4480> <WH3220>
They wandered <WH8582> in the wilderness <WH4057> in a solitary <WH3452> way; <WH1870> they found <WH4672> no <WH3808> city <WH5892> to dwell <WH4186> in.
Hungry <WH7457> and <WH1571> thirsty, <WH6771> their soul <WH5315> fainted <WH5848> in them.
Then they cried <WH6817> unto <WH413> the LORD <WH3068> in their trouble, <WH6862> and he delivered <WH5337> them out of their distresses. <WH4480> <WH4691>
And he led them forth <WH1869> by the right <WH3477> way, <WH1870> that they might go <WH1980> to <WH413> a city <WH5892> of habitation. <WH4186>
Oh that men would praise <WH3034> the LORD <WH3068> for his goodness, <WH2617> and for his wonderful works <WH6381> to the children <WH1121> of men! <WH120>
For <WH3588> he satisfieth <WH7646> the longing <WH8264> soul, <WH5315> and filleth <WH4390> the hungry <WH7457> soul <WH5315> with goodness. <WH2896>
Such as sit <WH3427> in darkness <WH2822> and in the shadow of death, <WH6757> being bound <WH615> in affliction <WH6040> and iron; <WH1270>
Because <WH3588> they rebelled against <WH4784> the words <WH561> of God, <WH410> and contemned <WH5006> the counsel <WH6098> of the most High: <WH5945>
Therefore he brought down <WH3665> their heart <WH3820> with labor; <WH5999> they fell down, <WH3782> and there was none <WH369> to help. <WH5826>
Then they cried <WH2199> unto <WH413> the LORD <WH3068> in their trouble, <WH6862> and he saved <WH3467> them out of their distresses. <WH4480> <WH4691>
He brought them out <WH3318> of darkness <WH4480> <WH2822> and the shadow of death, <WH6757> and broke <WH5423> their bands <WH4147> in sunder.
Oh that men would praise <WH3034> the LORD <WH3068> for his goodness, <WH2617> and for his wonderful works <WH6381> to the children <WH1121> of men! <WH120>
For <WH3588> he hath broken <WH7665> the gates <WH1817> of brass, <WH5178> and cut <WH1438> the bars <WH1280> of iron <WH1270> in sunder.
Fools <WH191> because <WH4480> <WH1870> of their transgression, <WH6588> and because of their iniquities, <WH4480> <WH5771> are afflicted. <WH6031>
Their soul <WH5315> abhorreth <WH8581> all manner <WH3605> of meat; <WH400> and they draw near <WH5060> unto <WH5704> the gates <WH8179> of death. <WH4194>
Then they cry <WH2199> unto <WH413> the LORD <WH3068> in their trouble, <WH6862> and he saveth <WH3467> them out of their distresses. <WH4480> <WH4691>
He sent <WH7971> his word, <WH1697> and healed <WH7495> them, and delivered <WH4422> them from their destructions. <WH4480> <WH7825>
Oh that men would praise <WH3034> the LORD <WH3068> for his goodness, <WH2617> and for his wonderful works <WH6381> to the children <WH1121> of men! <WH120>
And let them sacrifice <WH2076> the sacrifices <WH2077> of thanksgiving, <WH8426> and declare <WH5608> his works <WH4639> with rejoicing. <WH7440>
They that go down <WH3381> to the sea <WH3220> in ships, <WH591> that do <WH6213> business <WH4399> in great <WH7227> waters; <WH4325>
These <WH1992> see <WH7200> the works <WH4639> of the LORD, <WH3068> and his wonders <WH6381> in the deep. <WH4688>
For he commandeth, <WH559> and raiseth <WH5975> the stormy <WH5591> wind, <WH7307> which lifteth up <WH7311> the waves <WH1530> thereof.
They mount up <WH5927> to the heaven, <WH8064> they go down <WH3381> again to the depths: <WH8415> their soul <WH5315> is melted <WH4127> because of trouble. <WH7451>
They reel to and fro, <WH2287> and stagger <WH5128> like a drunken man, <WH7910> and are at their wits' end. <WH3605> <WH2451> <WH1104>
Then they cry <WH6817> unto <WH413> the LORD <WH3068> in their trouble, <WH6862> and he bringeth them out <WH3318> of their distresses. <WH4480> <WH4691>
He maketh <WH6965> the storm <WH5591> a calm, <WH1827> so that the waves <WH1530> thereof are still. <WH2814>
Then are they glad <WH8055> because <WH3588> they be quiet; <WH8367> so he bringeth <WH5148> them unto <WH413> their desired <WH2656> haven. <WH4231>
Oh that men would praise <WH3034> the LORD <WH3068> for his goodness, <WH2617> and for his wonderful works <WH6381> to the children <WH1121> of men! <WH120>
Let them exalt <WH7311> him also in the congregation <WH6951> of the people, <WH5971> and praise <WH1984> him in the assembly <WH4186> of the elders. <WH2205>
He turneth <WH7760> rivers <WH5104> into a wilderness, <WH4057> and the watersprings <WH4325> <WH4161> into dry ground; <WH6774>
A fruitful <WH6529> land <WH776> into barrenness, <WH4420> for the wickedness <WH4480> <WH7451> of them that dwell <WH3427> therein.
He turneth <WH7760> the wilderness <WH4057> into a standing <WH98> water, <WH4325> and dry <WH6723> ground <WH776> into watersprings. <WH4161> <WH4325>
And there <WH8033> he maketh the hungry to dwell, <WH3427> <WH7457> that they may prepare <WH3559> a city <WH5892> for habitation; <WH4186>
And sow <WH2232> the fields, <WH7704> and plant <WH5193> vineyards, <WH3754> which may yield <WH6213> fruits <WH6529> of increase. <WH8393>
He blesseth <WH1288> them also, so that they are multiplied <WH7235> greatly; <WH3966> and suffereth not <WH3808> their cattle <WH929> to decrease. <WH4591>
Again, they are minished <WH4591> and brought low <WH7817> through oppression, <WH4480> <WH6115> affliction, <WH7451> and sorrow. <WH3015>
He poureth <WH8210> contempt <WH937> upon <WH5921> princes, <WH5081> and causeth them to wander <WH8582> in the wilderness, <WH8414> where there is no <WH3808> way. <WH1870>
Yet setteth he the poor on high <WH7682> <WH34> from affliction, <WH4480> <WH6040> and maketh <WH7760> him families <WH4940> like a flock. <WH6629>
The righteous <WH3477> shall see <WH7200> it, and rejoice: <WH8055> and all <WH3605> iniquity <WH5766> shall stop <WH7092> her mouth. <WH6310>
Whoso <WH4310> is wise, <WH2450> and will observe <WH8104> these <WH428> things, even they shall understand <WH995> the lovingkindness <WH2617> of the LORD. <WH3068>
